lender.name: Vincent Stuhlen
lender.loan_because: Want to share my wealth

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can and I feel that I have the responsibility to do what I can to help make the world a better place. For everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I sit at the end of a production chain and make sure my company does not deliver products that do not work.

lender.name: Rutger
lender.loan_because: I believe these loans do change people's lives!

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: Its a great way to encourage enterprise and alleviate poverty

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: it is so easy to help people on the other side of the world to start or extend there business.

lender.name: Darren Brooks

lender.occupational_info:
I sell other companies products online through my websites via affiliate marketing. More information: www.darrenbrooks.co.uk

lender.name: Andrew

lender.name: Brendan
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Brendan teaches college astronomy and secondary physical science.

lender.name: Linda O.
lender.loan_because: A hand up not a hand out. Helping those who help themselves. Give a man a fish and he'll eat for a day (so long as he's not Vegan), teach him to fish and he'll eat for a lifetime... or at least until the fishing stocks run out, at which point he'll have to learn to grow potatoes or something like Brussels sprouts which would probably even survive nuclear Armageddon. Speaking of Armageddon, Jesus almost certainly said that I should give some of my money away as well, blah, blah, blah...

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I want to help those in need.

lender.name: Jef
lender.loan_because: I believe that business is one way that Christ can make His name known to all nations.
lender.occupational_info: I sell commercial real estate in West Texas.

lender.name: The Great Magumbo
lender.loan_because: From time to time everyone can use a little help.
lender.occupational_info: Just an average business man.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: Rather than keeping money in a large corporate bank, where the money might be going towards unethical and irresponsible business practices, I can take personal responsibility and make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I was a science teacher for a few years, but am working towards becoming a farmer instead.

lender.name: Gabriel
lender.occupational_info: As Kiva Fellow I assist Kiva's mission in Costa Rica. At Google I helped people make their websites better.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with money, resources and comforts that many people across this globe will never experience.

lender.name: Jarrod
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance to be what they want. We owe it to ourselves to help one another as best we can.

lender.name: Kaitlin
lender.loan_because:
I believe in free markets and in the dream of being able to make it on your own as an entrepreneur.
A great man once said, "What do we live for but to make life less difficult for others?"
lender.occupational_info: I work in retail to pay for my schooling. I am lucky to be able to have a job so that I can work my way through school, I want to help others to be able to reach their goals too!

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who need help excelling in life.

lender.name: Extended Grace
lender.loan_because: We loan because we can.
lender.occupational_info: Radical Spirituality

lender.name: Serena
lender.occupational_info: I recruit and train volunteers for the Colorado School of Mines. I help find ways for them to give their time and talents to their school.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurs have the power to change their futures (and their families' futures) for the better
lender.occupational_info: I am studying business and art at a college near Chicago, Illinois. I also own a jewelry-design business with my sister.

lender.name: Volker
lender.loan_because: It will make the world a better place for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I am teaching accounting and computer science at a vocational school.

lender.name: Kathy

lender.name: Clinton

lender.name: Charm, Serina, Patrick

lender.occupational_info: We are a extended family that is gifted by each other and want to share this with others who are trying to help themselves.

lender.name: Mario

lender.occupational_info: I love it.

lender.name: Kristine
lender.loan_because: I received a gift certificate for Christmas last year, but had not heard of Kiva previous to that. What a great idea!
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office with about 30 people who make cinema ticket bookings. It is a fun place to work and the people are friendly.

lender.name: Avi

lender.occupational_info: Run some websites to promote Jewish values.

lender.name: Shlomo
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to be born into a family that had means.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: one pillar of Judaism is repairing the world, and I believe Kiva.org has provided us with a wonderful way of doing so!
lender.occupational_info: I run http://www.JewishinNewYork.com, a website that helps people find Jewish-related businesses and organizations in New York, including synagogues, kosher restaurants, community organizations, etc.

lender.occupational_info: I am a good cook and often cook for friends and family when I can.

lender.name: Jarrett
lender.loan_because: a little help can go a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Schneider Electric, the world's Energy Management specialist. Our mission is to help people everywhere do more, while using less of our common planet.

lender.occupational_info: I'm a physician and professor with a passion for nutritional supplement design...

lender.name: Dean

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: 99% boredom, 1% sheer terror

lender.occupational_info: I am a workaholic person it comes to work..and i love working too in order to earn and pay my loan amount..

lender.loan_because: I want to help another woman have a better life -- one at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English and literature to college students. Many of them are are studying business, or nursing, or accounting, etc. I have also taught English as a Second Language to college students from other cultures and to adult immigrants to Canada.

lender.name: Denille
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to pursue their dreams!

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I like to help and I'm inspired by the ideas and hard work by the entrepreneurs on Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: I create interesting websites that people want to visit.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: It's some small help
lender.occupational_info: Assisting people

lender.name: Darren
lender.loan_because: Philippians 2:13 for it is God who works in you to will and to act according to his good purpose.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Emergency assistance to Law Enforcement. I help 911 operators by providing information or GPS on customers who call 911 for emergency assistance.

lender.name: Kandi
lender.loan_because: I am a very small, sustainable agriculture farmer. I believe in the production of food in a sustainable manner and feel through enabling others to do the same I am paying forward - in a way - to future generations of farmers throughout the world. And, mostly, because I just love people and want to share that love.
lender.occupational_info: We are small farmers and work away from home as well. Our passion is in the farming, however. We feel fortunate beyond our dreams to have our land and try to manage it in a way that it will be productive for many many generations to come. We hope others want to do the same and enjoy helping in small ways to assist in this joint food producing venture.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want others to succeed from hard work.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur.

lender.name: Crossland Family
lender.loan_because: we want to teach our children to think outside of ourselves and where we live. This process helps them to understand how much we have and to be more grateful and generous humans.

lender.name: Maritza
lender.loan_because: We as human beings are responsible for one another, the Lord moves my heart and spirit to believe in this

lender.name: Rickard
lender.loan_because: Every entrepreneurial spirit deserve an opportunity to succeed.

lender.name: LonePalm
lender.loan_because: A small attempt to pay it forward.

lender.name: Alan & Erin
lender.loan_because: I loan because someone is in need and I can help. We (all of humanity) are together on this one planet experiencing the same human condition. Joy/sadness, gain/loss, success/failure, inspiration/hoplessness, these are familiar experiences to all of us! The stories told through Kiva from people in need are not from strangers in distant lands, but instead from my brothers and sisters with whom are close enough to touch. Micro-financing through Kiva is simply a modern day integral means of spreading enlightenment.
lender.occupational_info: At my job I am part of a large team devoted to healing the sick. I help to find what makes you sick so we may begin to find the correct treatment.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I've been there
lender.occupational_info: Healthcare

lender.name: Bobbie
lender.loan_because: I think this is a way to pay forward the blessing I enjoy

lender.name: Carly
lender.loan_because: I want to support entrepreneurship in developing countries. I hope to be an entrepreneur one day myself, as well.
lender.occupational_info: I promote sustainable practices on college campuses in the Southeastern United States. This means working with college students, faculty and administration to help their campus become more efficient, conserve energy, water and resources, improve curriculum and green workforce development programs and transition to renewable energy.

lender.name: Kay
lender.loan_because: I have long had a desire to empower women and Kiva makes it possible in such an easy way.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: People need it.
lender.occupational_info: I help nonprofit, local government, and tribal organizations obtain grant funding through U.S. federal, state, and private agencies.

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: I am searching for concrete, pragmatic ways to help women in developing countries become self-sufficient and successful. I look forward to learning more.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do!

lender.name: Ashlie
lender.loan_because: Once upon a time I wanted to open a boutique of my own, but couldn't get the start up capital to do so. And while my goals have led me elsewhere, I want to other people have the chance I never got. I want to help them see there dreams come into existence.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Actress and fashion designer. I own ScorpiosAttic.com and Ashlie's Super Happy Fun Blog. I love life and love to write and celebrate everything in it! :D

lender.name: kerry
lender.loan_because: Procrastination is the thief of dreams
lender.occupational_info: Challenging, rewarding

lender.loan_because: I want to help empower others.
lender.occupational_info: I design websites that help businesses, people, and organizations connect and communicate on a broader scale.

lender.occupational_info: I am a social entrepreneur. My goal is to make environmental and socially positive products more accessible. This is done via my startup: http://www.eco3p.com

lender.name: Lisa

lender.occupational_info: I am involved in research on people who have open heart surgery to better understand their experiences with surgery, their outcomes after surgery, and all of the effects on their quality of life.

lender.occupational_info: I work with craftsmen, craftswomen, and engineers to repair and maintain equipment and structures used to refine oil into useable products.

lender.name: John
lender.occupation: HVAC and Solar energy tech, Luthier.
lender.loan_because:
I appreciate those that have helped me when I was needed a hand up, and I also have Family in Eesti and Slovensko (not blood related) as well, I am loyal to both countries equally and always think of ways that I can help out.
Be Kind! for every one you meet is/may be fighting a harder battle!
lender.occupational_info: Refrigeration and furnace repair, welder, I work with metal mostly, I work with small restaurants and bakeries all the way up to giant casinos and food production factories, and I also design and install solar energy systems for both commercial and home use. I also build guitars :)

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: it's a powerful way to help someone who has a real goal in mind and truly appreciates the benefit of hard work and determination. everyone needs some help every once in a while and it's so easy for many of us in other parts of the world to just not go out for that pricey lunch or buy that pair of shoes and instead be part of a team that helps someone reinvent their lives and their community.
lender.occupational_info: I work on a team that designs software that teachers use in schools to educate young people.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who have taken the initiative to improve their standard of living through project loans with Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I work to preserve the artifacts stored and displayed at the provincial museum in Victoria.

lender.name: Ankur
lender.loan_because: I like to help people out. I feel happy when I help others and make them happy.
lender.occupational_info: My work is to test computer programs so as to make sure that they work correctly when people across the world try to use them on their computers.

Ia ditambah dengan pembekuan tenaga kerja oleh kerajaan Indonesia pada tahun 2009. Saya masih menjalankan perniagaan ini dan sedang memulakan satu lagi cabang perniagaan.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: There is always someone that can need you and someone that can help you...

lender.occupational_info: I work for a computer software company, ensuring the software works for our users.

lender.loan_because: i feel good about it

lender.occupational_info: Being retired enables me to do what I want when I want.

lender.occupational_info: I am a custom applicator of pesticides and nutrients on agricultural crops. I also farm wine grapes and plums.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I am particularly interested in Ukraine. We have spent time in the country and have Ukrainian friends. I'd like to offer assistance to Ukrainian's.
lender.occupational_info: I am the mother of a Ukrainian born son who is now 15. I have worked in the corporate world for over 20 years in Marketing and Product Development.

lender.occupational_info: I am an Operating Room Nurse (RN), and I assist in NeuroSurgical cases..brain tumors...brain aneurysms...etc....It's very rewarding!

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: there are a lot of hard working people out there that need just a little help

lender.name: Ginger and Mary
lender.loan_because: we want to share the blessings life has provided.
lender.occupational_info: Mary - science teacher, wildlife rehabilitation. Ginger -Principal - Clackamas Academy of Industrial Sciences

lender.name: Sahana
lender.loan_because:
I believe in the “Community of Oneness”. We all are ONE yet no two are ALIKE. Each one is Unique and to discover this uniqueness we need to be connected with each other.
This is a wonderful opportunity to help those who have dreams with endless possibilities. I am a creative person and love ideas. This is one way for me to help the needy by holding their hands together.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: I love that these people I'm loaning to are trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I drive city buses. Connect with me if you wish on facebook under Elaine Winters Thyner.

lender.loan_because: Focus is an online resource where professionals can freely access the research and expert advice they need to make better business decisions.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I think that christians are asked to help the poor and to give.
